definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[ענן]] (√ of foll., perh. orig. cover, as Sab. [[ענן]] = [[טַלל]] (Heb. [[חלל]]), DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 26 f.; or < Ar.9an=a appear, present oneself, specif. intervene as an obstacle (Lane; cf. Lag:BN 103), hence 9ananun clouds, as intervening, and so obstructing; cf. NH [[עָנׇן]] cloud = BH (rare), vb. denom. Pi. [[עִנֵּן]] as BH; Targum [[עֲנׇנׇא]], Syr.  clouds).
